template.name: aes_sql_command_Create_table
template.value: CREATE TABLE songs( id INTEGER, name TEXT, genre TEXT, rate REAL, some_raw_data BLOB );
template.description: Creates a table to store songs

template.name: aes_sql_command_Create_a_table_with_data_from_another_table
template.value: SELECT * INTO rockssongs FROM songs WHERE genre ='rock';
template.description: Creates a table composed of rock songs from the "songs" table

template.name: aes_sql_command_Count_example
template.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_city) AS total FROM students;
template.description: How many different cities do our students come from?

template.name: aes_sql_command_Delete_rows
template.description: Deletes from a table all songs that have a rating less than 5

template.name: aes_sql_command_Left_join_example
template.value: SELECT students.name FROM students LEFT JOIN math_class ON students.id = math_class.student_id WHERE math_class.grade > 5;
template.description: SQL query for selecting all students from a table students that has grade bigger than 5 in the table math_class

template.name: aes_sql_command_Inner_join_example
template.value: SELECT DISTINCT students.id, students.name FROM students INNER JOIN math_class ON students.id = math_class.student_id;
template.description: SQL query for selecting all students from a table students that are also present in the table math_class

template.name: aes_sql_command_Insert_example
template.value: INSERT INTO albums(ambum_id, artist_name, album_name) VALUES('12345', 'David Bowie','Ziggy Stardust');
template.description: Insert a David Bowie album into a database table

template.name: aes_sql_command_Update_a_table
template.value: UPDATE songs SET already_listened ="yes" WHERE genre = "rock";
template.description: SQL query for updating a table
